document_data.mainbody:
he Shadowgates House was an exclusive club located in Athkatlas Gem District.
The Shadowgates House was a large private building in the westerly part of the Gem District. It stood on the Alaiths Walk, south of the famous Flamewater Fountain and immediately west of the Dancing Dolphins House.
The Shadowgates House was already a well-known private club for Athkatlan wealthy and noble women by the late 14 century DR. The Shadowgates House was known to most city inhabitants as the place where "crones go to party and say nasty things in private."
